item.title: Fisherman (Level 5)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Cleaning lady (Level 7)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Presenter (Level 8)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Butcher (Level 6)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Thug (Level 4)
item.description: Forced pushed a branch with git push -f

item.title: Fisherman (Level 4)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 3)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Product Manager (Level 9)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 11)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Garage Inventor
item.description: Used a custom alias for a Git command

item.title: Cherry Picker
item.description: Used git cherry-pick to add a sha from another branch into the current branch.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Master Collector (Level 9)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Traveler (Level 4)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 3)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 9)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 8)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level 8)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.
